author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-4360 more spec implementation, mostly about which import contexts get processed when

author: bago
msg: Added "released" openspf testsuite to the tests.
We previously only tested against "trunk" testsuite and openspf advised to check against the latest release (2008.08).
The testsuite check the released suite synchronously and the trunk asynchronously.

author: sabob
msg: improved filefield validation to render a message if the field is required

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-4543 create timer in priveleged block to not tie up callers classloader.  Thanks to Janko Heilgeist

msg: HBASE-1457 Taking down ROOT/META regionserver can result in cluster becoming in-operational
